Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Discover new research findings from a global survey of 1,100 leaders at organizations with annual revenue above $15 bn across 15 countries. As organizations shift from isolated pilots to enterprise-wide deployments of generative and agentic AI, they are unlocking transformative benefits in innovation and productivity. Discover actionable insights for business and technology leaders across industries and functions.
